charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1101_0100_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was hanging out with
Elio, Iris, and Wally while having battles.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_0200_10: Man, that was so much fun! We got to do a lot!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_0300_10:
Iris and Wally went to get something to drink, so
why don’t we take a break while we wait for
them to get back?
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_0400_10: Hahaha! Looks like Popplio still has a lot of energy.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_0401_0600_10:
*chuckle* Eh, I’m a little tired. We’ve been
out and about all day.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_0402_0800_10: Yeah, me, too! We did a lot today!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_0900_10:
I think it’s because we played beach volleyball
with Popplio’s balloons.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_1000_10:
It was tons of fun, but it also was the
most exhausting!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_1100_10:
I was starting to feel nostalgic because it kind of
reminded me of Alola!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_1200_10: We used to train nonstop, just like that!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_0401_1400_10:
Looking back on it, I guess we did do a lot. We
really did train all day long.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_0402_1600_10: That was just normal for us at the time.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_1700_10:
It could be tough at times, but I think I was able
to get through it thanks to Popplio.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_0401_1900_10:
Because to Popplio, hard work is just another way
to play!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_0402_2100_10:
Yeah. ’Cause to him, hard work is just another
way of playing.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_2200_10:
Popplio really likes to draw attention to himself by
making big balloons.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_2300_10: At first, he wasn’t very good at it...
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_2400_10: But he still had fun, even despite those mistakes.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_2500_10:
Eventually, he was able to make huge and
incredible balloons!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_2600_10:
That’s something Popplio taught me—even if
you’re not so good at something, if you have fun
while practicing, you’ll get better at it!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_0401_2800_10:
But I bet that’s something you already
knew, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_0402_3000_10: Yeah! I’m proud to have him as my partner!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_3200_10:
When I hang out and play with friends like you
and Popplio...
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_3300_10: I forget I was ever tired in the first place!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_3400_10: Or something like that! Shall we call it a day?
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_3600_10:
Wow! He still has the energy to make such a large
balloon even after playing so much!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_3700_10:
Well, we should jump right in and play with him!
Popplio, make another one!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2301_1201_3800_10:
Hahaha! Popplio sure is energetic all the time.
Watching him makes me feel extra energized, too!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2311_1201_0100_10: Misty, would you have a Pokémon battle with me?
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2311_1201_0200_10: I want to battle a Water-type Pokémon expert!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2311_1201_0300_10: Sure! But first, I have a question for you!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2311_1201_0400_10: Elio! What’s your policy on Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2311_1201_0600_10:
I must work together with Popplio to challenge
ourselves to get better! And then I must challenge,
challenge, and challenge even more!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2311_0501_0900_10:
I bet you’d have no trouble making your way to
Kanto and challenging our Pokémon League!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2311_0501_1000_10:
Awesome! Did you hear that, Popplio? We got a
compliment from Misty!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2311_0501_1200_10: No way! I get to see Popplio evolve?!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2311_0501_1300_10: Let’s keep on raising the bar, Popplio!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2312_1201_0100_10:
Silvally and I have continued to polish our moves
here on Pasio...
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2312_1201_0200_10:
but I wonder just how strong we’ve become since
we left Alola.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2312_1201_0300_10: Elio. I want a battle with you. You OK with that?
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2312_1201_0400_10:
Sure! We’ve been working hard since we arrived
here, too!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2312_1201_0500_10: We won’t lose to you, Gladion!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2312_0101_0700_10: Let’s go. We’re coming at you with all we’ve got!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2312_0501_0800_10:
You really have a good Pokémon. And you’ve
gotten a lot stronger, too, Elio.
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2312_0501_0900_10:
You too, Gladion! Looks like you’ve strengthened
your friendship with Silvally even more!
charaepi_ch0122_00_yo/2312_0501_1100_10:
Heh. Looks like we both were able to strengthen
our bonds with our partners.
